title: Classic TV Animals
description: Famous animals from TV shows and movies

questions.question: What breed of dog was Lassie, the beloved TV collie who always saved the day?
What was the name of the German Shepherd who starred in his own TV adventure series in the 1950s?
In the TV series 'Mister Ed,' what kind of animal was Ed?
Who played Mister Ed's owner, Wilbur Post?
What was the name of the dolphin star of the 1964 movie and subsequent TV series?
In the TV show 'Gentle Ben,' what kind of animal was Ben?
What was the name of the loyal dog on 'The Adventures of Ozzie and Harriet'?
Which cartoon dog was Shaggy's best friend in 'Scooby-Doo, Where Are You!'?
What was the name of Roy Rogers' famous palomino horse?
Which TV show featured a chimpanzee named Judy who lived with a game warden in Africa?
What was the name of the cross-eyed lion in the TV series 'Daktari'?
On 'The Beverly Hillbillies,' what type of animal did Ellie May Clampett keep as a pet collection?
What was the name of the Lone Ranger's horse?
Which Hanna-Barbera cartoon featured a cat-and-mouse duo in endless comic chases?
What was the name of the intelligent collie dog in the 1950s series 'The Adventures of Lassie' who always helped her owner Timmy?
